/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling city street bathed in the warmth of a sunny day. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. The street below is a hive of activity, filled with cars and buses in motion, their colors muted under the bright sunlight. Buildings line the sides of the street, their windows reflecting the sunlight. The perspective of the image is from a high vantage point, looking down on the street, giving a sense of scale and depth to the scene.
